Pathological modification liver structure functionality might result complex modification various factor include liver blood flow , hypoalbuminaemia , indirectly affect renal function reduce hepatic drug metabolize capability include microsomal oxidase system [ Howden , 1989 ] . Although FF/GW642444M deliver directly site action , i.e . lung , large portion administer dose swallow . For FF GW642444 drug absorb GI tract undergoes first pass metabolism via CYP3A4 . In addition , drug absorb systemic circulation metabolise liver remove biliary clearance . Hence , possibility use patient impaired liver function pharmacokinetics inhale FF and/or GW642444 may change due reduce first pas metabolism and/or reduce clearance . The result study aid decide whether dose adjustment justify estimate adjustment patient impaired hepatic function .
